QuestData.Title: Treasure Reclamation
QuestData.Description: Blood and thunder! We have our reinforcements, but they still need to be paid. They won't be cheap.$B$BUp on Deepfin Ridge to the northwest, the slimy gilblin have stolen all sorts of treasure. It's time to reclaim some of it for the Horde.$B$BHellscream's eyes are upon you, $n!
QuestData.CompletionText: How much plunder did you get, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: That's a lot! And we know where there's more should the need arise.
